Seo.title: Jonathan Cannizzaro
Seo.description: Portfolio of Jonathan Cannizzaro, a frontend software developer specialized in modern web technologies and user experience.

Greeting.title: Hi all, I'm Jonathan
Greeting.intro: I am a Frontend Software Developer üöÄ with experience in JavaScript, React.js, Node.js, and other libraries and frameworks. I create user-friendly and performant interfaces to enhance user experience.
Greeting.skills: My skills include responsive web development and accessibility. I stay up to date with the latest frontend technologies and trends, always seeking new challenges to improve my skills.

Skills.title: What I Do
Skills.intro: I am incurably curious about both front-end and back-end technologies, but my absolute passion is front-end.
Skills.highlight1: ‚ö° I develop highly interactive user interfaces for your web and mobile applications.
Skills.highlight2: ‚ö° Progressive Web Applications (PWA) in traditional and SPA stacks.
Skills.highlight3: ‚ö° Integration of third-party services such as Firebase/AWS/Digital Ocean.
Skills.highlight4: ‚ö° I also strive to optimize web accessibility and performance through best practices and standards.

card.institution: Alma Mater Studiorum ‚Äì University of Bologna
description: I completed two years of the three-year Bachelor's degree program in Computer Science at the University of Bologna, gaining a strong foundation in programming, computer security, and collaboration skills through group projects.
Although I completed only two years of studies, my experience at the University of Bologna was a significant personal and professional growth opportunity.

syscons.description: I worked on internal company products and specialized in HTML, CSS, React + Redux + Saga + TypeScript, GitLab branch and repository management, Google Cloud, REST APIs, TDD & E2E testing, and agile workflows on Jira.

nexum.description: I contributed to internal company products and focused on HTML, CSS, React + Redux + Saga + TypeScript, GitLab branch and repository management, Google Cloud, REST APIs, TDD & E2E testing, and agile practices on Jira.

portfolio.title: Personal Portfolio

Contact.title: Reach out to me!
Contact.subtitle: DISCUSS A PROJECT OR JUST WANT TO SAY HI? MY INBOX IS OPEN FOR ALL.
Contact.description: I currently work for a company as a frontend developer on ecommerce projects and I'm following three courses on Udemy: React Native, the Next.js framework, and Node.js.
